hardware

Interface DCMotor


  • public interface DCMotor
    DCMotor is an abridged version of the FTC DCMotor interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DCMotor.Direction 
      static class  DCMotor.RunMode 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentPosition()
      Get current motor position (i.e., encoder ticks)
      DCMotor.Direction getDirection()
      Get the direction of the motor.
      DCMotor.RunMode getMode()
      Get the operation mode of the motor.
      double getPower()
      Get the motor power
      void setDirection(DCMotor.Direction direction)
      Set the DIRECTION of the motor (in this simulator, you would typically use REVERSE for the left motor and FORWARD for the right motor).
      void setMode(DCMotor.RunMode mode)
      Set operation mode of the motor.
      void setPower(double power)
      Set the motor power.

    • Method Detail

      • setMode

        void setMode(DCMotor.RunMode mode)
        Set operation mode of the motor.
        Parameters:
        mode - Note: RUN_USING_ENCODER and RUN_WITHOUT_ENCODER will behave the same in this simulator. For real robot programming, they will behave very differently, and it's essential to choose the appropriate mode. RUN_TO_POSITION is not implemented in the simulator. Setting mode to STOP_AND_RESET_ENCODER will set the power to zero and zero the encoder. To run the motor again, the mode must be set to either RUN_USING_ENCODER or RUN_WITHOUT_ENCODER.

      • getMode

        DCMotor.RunMode getMode()
        Get the operation mode of the motor.
        Returns:

      • setDirection

        void setDirection(DCMotor.Direction direction)
        Set the DIRECTION of the motor (in this simulator, you would typically use REVERSE for the left motor and FORWARD for the right motor).
        Parameters:

        Set the motor power.
        Parameters:
